key.name: image-dir-uri
key.summary: Default location for the Create/Restore disk image dialogs
key.description: Default location for the Create/Restore disk image dialogs. If blank the ~/Documents folder is used.

key.name: num-samples
key.summary: The number of samples the benchmark will include for the read/write test.

key.name: sample-size-mib
key.summary: The number of MiB (1048576 bytes) to read/write for each sample.

key.name: do-write
key.summary: To enable or disable the write test.

key.name: num-access-samples
key.summary: The number of samples the benchmark will do for the access time test.
